author: Caroline Dunn
title: SPI Debuts in Gartner's 2015 Magic Quadrant for Merchandise Assortment Management Applications
text:
Software Paradigms International Group, LLC (SPI), an award winning technology provider of choice to retailers worldwide, announces their debut in Gartner's Magic Quadrant for Merchandise Assortment Management Applications. Gartner analysts evaluated 12 merchandise assortment management application vendors based on the criteria of “completeness of vision” and “ability to execute” and has placed SPI in the Niche Players quadrant.
“We believe SPI’s debut on the Magic Quadrant constitutes powerful validation of our proven, innovative solutions for retail technology,” said Sid Mookerji, Global CEO, SPI. “We are 100% retail technology focused serving retailers in all tiers providing a complete suite of Omni-Channel solutions. We feel entering the Magic Quadrant for the first time is validation of the technology and company we have built.”
Access the full report on Gartner.com (available for purchase or to subscribers)
Source: Gartner, Inc. Magic Quadrant for Merchandise Assortment Management Applications by Robert Hetu, 05 August 2015.

About SPI: Software Paradigms International Group, LLC (SPI), founded in 1994, is an award winning products and service provider for retailers around the world. SPI is headquartered in Atlanta, GA, with offices in Australia, Brazil, Canada, & Singapore, and development centers in India, and Nepal.
SPI offers complete Retail IT solutions including custom application development, integration, consulting, merchandising, analytics, mobility, vendor management, and infrastructure. http://www.spi.com
